title: Quite enjoy the trip
body:
Helpful tour guide, polite, considerate and responsible.ltinerary fully and clearly briefed
Reasonable time allocation
name: Irene

title: Amazing tour of Batu Cave, Batik & Tin Factory
body: It was an amazing experience going to Batu Cave, Batik, and Tin Factory without the hassle of hopping in from one transport to another.
name: Odyssey18723139199

title: Batu caves with raj
body: Raj as a guide was so clear and informative....perfectly timed with no delays. The bus was absolutely clean. ....
name: OnAir20086459444

title: Good half day trip
body:
Captain Ravi is amazing guide who was very informative about the whole process
Gave us a history lesson of entire KL :)

Very highly recommended

Regards
Keshav
name: Roving29691687645

title: Amazing wonderful experience worth it
body: Our tour guide Raj was so welcoming and made the session so interesting with the explanations and the style thank you raj for the wonderful tour experience
name: Kiran K

title: Tour to Batu caves and City tour
body: Overall experience we had was great ! The tour guide who is Sasi was so helpful and we had a lot of places to visit and take pictures. I would definitely recommend to anyone this tour.
name: Jurabek S

title: Batu Cave / Royal Selangor and Batik Tour
body: Guide Sasi is very knowledgeable and friendly. He is very friendly and try to accommodate our request. He explain well in details and also checked whether we have any question for him
name: Inspire37968309224

title: Batu cave review
body: Our trip guide Raj is informative and friendly. Shared a lot of stories and facts with us. Highly recommended.
name: FarAway57497564477

title: Fun quick trip to Batu Caves
body: Mcdel(?) - +60 16-924 6570 and driver were well organized and communicated well with all guests. He gave interesting and informative stories about the Batu Caves, East Coast Batik and the Royal Selangor pewter factory. He did well to mix in some funny stories but also remained educational and informative! Well done!
name: DayTrip53489435957

title: Batu Cave Tour
body: Our tour guide Mcpall Singh was very friendly and provided us with a lot of useful advice regarding to the tour. It was a pleasant experience.
name: Roving19546524148

title: Must-go-to in Kuala Lumpur.
body:
The highlight was the Batu Caves. Incredible what nature can produce over millions of years. The 272 steps to reach the caves should not discourage anyone. One can rest anytime on the way up.

Our guide, Raj, was very knowledgeable and educational. He explained in detail a lot of things you'd hardly find on the internet. He gave us a lot of interesting information. Thanks, Raj.

I highly recommend this tour. Well worth it.
name: Johann M

title: Simple enjoyable trip
body: Enjoyed this half day Batu caves group tour. Our guide Mcpall was amazing💯: very helpful, knowledgeable and funny. It included a trip to Royal Selangor and batik.
name: Sunshine64380089065

title: Nice half day Batu caves trip
body:
A nice package to cover the suburbs and Batu caves (temple). They had also covered one handloom design factory and a tin factory visit. Batu caves visit was provided ~1hr which felt somewhat a short time frame to cover the place. Other 2 places was of 20min time limit. Travelling will take up to 1 hr to n fro. Overall the package is a nice option.

Our tour guide Mr. Raj, very enthusiastic person gave a lot of information about Malaysia n the places we were visiting. Very friendly n helpful person.
Information about the vehicle, pickup points, n drop points and contacting prior the trip were all smooth.
name: Shashank P

title: Excellent tour!
body: It was great! Our guide Mc told us a lot of interesting historical facts about Malasia, also he has good sense of humor :) The Caves was breathtaking! We had a very good trip. Everything was better then we expected.
name: Alexandra K

title: Thank you.
body:
Very good tour and very friendly.
Mcpall was our tour guide. He gave food advice about how to make the most of our trip.
name: Navigator66286844571

title: Great!
body:
Amar Singh was an awesome guide, absolutely worth the money!

Would definitely recommend this tour.
name: Ark M

title: Excellent guide
body: The tour was excellent, especially the explanation of the guide, named Amar Singh. Thanks for all 😊
name: Maria Rosa R

title: Batu cave is impressive
body:
Amar singh
We like the tour. The gide is friendly, knowledgeable and likes his job.
The tour was goed organised.
name: Travel20585135855

title: Nice tour
body: Amar Singh as been a very cool guide. I enjoyed the tour. No problem to notice. We visited 3 places including Batu caves.
name: Alassane S

title: Great tour
body: The tour was really great, worth the money! Raj, our tour guide has a good english, he told us a lot of things about Batu Caves, the country and answered a lot of questions. Highly recommend 🫶🏻
name: Iulia G

title: KL with siblings
body: Great tour indeed! The toue guide is very learn ed and friendly! Thank you Amar! Batu Cave, Batik and Pewter
name: Curious01710737086

title: Awesome!
body: Amazing tour! Thank yu Ivy Holidays and kudos to our tour guide, Raj - very accommodating and knowledgeable! 🌟
name: Melannie S

title: Excellent Tour
body: Visited Batu Caves, Batik factory & Royal Selangor tin factory. Guide was excellent. Very knowledgeable.
name: Kanch85

title: Cameron Highlands Day Tour
body:
Our guide was MC' and the driver Abdul.

The guide told us many interesting things about the region, historie and culture. He was very good informed and friendly. When we had a question, he could give always a answer.

The tour was very good organised and had a good speed - no usual to what we had experienced before in Malaysia.

We can defenetly recommend his tour. We think 1 day is enough but when you want to spend more time book a tour for 2 day but not more.
name: DayTrip27073307058

title: An amazing tour
body: Smooth tour, from pick up until drop off. All the places we went are all fun and amazing! The tour guide Amir Singh is superb, very informative and accommodating. Highly recommended.
name: Quest35497948776

title: Great day tour!
body: Amar singh is an amazing guide, interactive and knowledgeable. The places we visited were very interesting and batu caves was great!
name: Ravan O

title: Good experience
body: I loved this tour. You can visit three different places in a short time. In addition, the guide explains each place in detail so that you can learn more about the place when you visit it. The Batu Caves were especially impressive.
name: K S

title: Amazing tour
body:
The half day tour with our guide Mcpall was very nice. He was kind enough to share some bits of Malaysian history and also give brief explanation on how pewter was discovered and it's usages.
Our last stop was the temple which is very impressive and is worth to see but be careful of the cute monkeys
name: Go59823712596

title: Amazing one
body: Our tourist guide is MR. Mec who is very knowledgeable,informative and considerable one,  he's like a teacher that lecturing us about the history of malaysia and particularly in kuala lumpur. I think he really fits on this job. Great well sir mec. Keep it up
name: Menard D

title: Informative experience!
body: Our tour guide Raj gives very informative guides throughout the half day tour. Had a wonderful experience in Royal Selangor Factory in KL! No wonder Royal Selangor metal stuff are so expensive as they are mostly handmade. Thumbs up!
name: Esther T

title: Positive Experience
body: Good and informative tour. Guide Mr Raj was knowledgeable and quite entertaining. Overall its a positive experience for us.
name: Gary T

title: Nice day trip
body: The trip was good and our guide Mr Dyalan was very informative giving us a lot of national information. It was just about the right time. My only problem was that the drop off was not as per my itinerary which should have been back at my hotel, Instead we where given a choice of 3 drop off points, ordinarily I wouldn't have minded but my legs where hurting so I really did not fancy walking 20 minutes to my hotel or trying to  figure out the public transport or waiting around for a grab not to mention the additional cost. But apart from that a good trip.
name: aisha21

title: Wonderful Experience
body: It was a wonderful short trip with our very pleasant and informative guide Mr Thayalan. Would recommend this trip for everyone visiting Malaysia.
name: Dream22397072405

title: Batu experience
body: Tour Guide Siva shared a lot of information and is accommodating. Nice tour. The experience went smooth.
name: empagtakhan

title: Amazing Experience
body: Tour guide Suresh is doing a great job in being a tour guide. He is accomodating and approachable the same with the driver. Overall is a very good experience with my fellow solo travelers.
name: Daydream19098202087

title: EXCELLENT!
body: Tour guide was so nice, knowledgeable and very friendly. Driver was so nice as well and approachable!
name: Camper35684468466

title: Great guide, good short tour.
body: Our tour guide Raj was so warm and welcoming to all guests. He made sure give loads of information and engaged with everyone. The tour was good too, but a little less time at batty caves specially for older people to climb up and down.
name: Wanderer03477462912

title: Raj perfect
body: Raj was our guide and he was perfect. He explained us everything. Also, he made us laugh and have a good time here in the tour. We visitors 3 places and everything was amazing
name: Marina P

title: Interesting tour of Batu Caves (total of 272 steps for rainbow stairs), Royal Selangnor n Batik Factory
body:
Mcpall, our tour guide was early in his arrival. He is obliging n entertaining in his conduct of the tour n sharing of history n culture of the 3 plcs we visited, Batu Caves, East Coast Batik Factory n Royal Selangnor.
Nice experience for this entire half-day tour. Thank you Mcpall.
name: FarAway12996562506

title: Good tour but more guidance inside the cave would’ve been nice
body:
Nice tour to the batu caves, a textile art/painting establishment and Royal Selangor.

The caves were beautiful but I’d have liked some guidance inside the caves as to what things signified. But we were basically told to reconvene here a x time and you can do whatever you want on your own.

The batik place was interesting to see once but not really my thing.

Royal Selangor was more my thing and we got to see the work that goes into making those beautiful objects.
name: Luk

title: Batu Cave half day tour
body: Had a nice trip with a great guide (Mcpall) who was informative and gave good explanations on the way. All the stops was a great experience
name: KarenGade

title: Amazing gift
body: The views, landmarks and cave were just amazing! Our Guide, Mcpall, was really kind and his explanations were clear! Very good guide and bus driver!
name: Lalexito

title: Good tour
body: Good trip.good guide .we are  so happy.thanks to the trip.thanks to guide.guide nya bisa bahasa indonedia
name: Meander42332351451

title: Very easy and good trip!
body: The guide, Mcpall, was very good and informative! Gave us lots of knowledge about Malaysia and Kuala Lumpur.
name: Camper11663420944

title: Intellectual
body: Tour was really intellectual, took us places where I might have not thought going. It was very interesting to learn about Malaysian culture. Tour guide Mcpall was very helpful and friendly. Highly recommended.
name: TamK2015

title: Awesome tour!
body: The tour was really comfortable and informative. The guide was really nice and easy to approach. He also taught us a lot of things abiut the places we visited.
name: Carla

title: Fun Enjoyable Tour
body: The trip was fun and full of knowledge. The tour Guide Raj really knows what to tell us and give good service. Will definitely do it again 👍
name: Evy M

title: Well spent 3 hours
body: Mr. Mcpall was a very kind guide, and full of knowledge! Great 3 hours and very practical with hotel pickup and drop-off.
name: Ole Kristian

title: Great tríp to batu caves
body: Very Good experience, so interesting, the guide was great, Good explanation and kind guy, Thanks Mcpall
name: sergio c

title: Very informative
body: Our tourguide Mcpall was very informative about the history of Batu Caves and do's and don't going to the cave. Pick up was also on time. Overall a wonderful day.
name: Jet60543147401

title: Batu Cave
body: Amazing trip guided by Mcpall. Visited Batu Cave, Royal Selangor Pewter Factory and Batik Factory showroom, this place so cool and must visit when come to Malay.
name: CaroL

title: Great experience
body: Our guide Amar Singh was amazing! Great knowledge of KL along with lots of other random facts and figures! Made the experience comfortable and a real pleasure for all! Would highly recommend!!
name: Voyage52819730890

title: Satisfied.
body: Ning our tour guide was so amazing, very informative. Delighted she is our tour guide. It is highly recommended for tourists exploring the Batu Cave and Cable Car.
name: Go48397409574

title: Batu Cave & KL Suburban Tour
body: Amazing tour. Every educational from Batu Cave, to Balik making & Tin Factory. Raj was accommodating & well-versed.
name: Manuel Miguel

title: Batu caves tour and country tour
body: Tour guide Thayalan and Coach Captain Ben are great. They were kind. And the tour was very informative. The coach was clean. Overall it was a very good experience. Thank you Ivy Holidays!
name: Kristine Joy T

title: Awesome
body: Mr. Sasi did a great job during our tour. He explained the destinations very well and accommoodated us so much.
name: Frank R

title: Country & Batu Cave Tour - Highly Recommended!
body: Amazing tour guide, very knowledgeable! Time alloted is just fine to enjoy everything. Overall very nice experience!
name: Sightsee46559748117

title: Mount Batur half day tour
body: Ravi is very friendly, knowledgeable and very detailed in his explanations :) Would highly recommend him for anyone who is on tour to KL. Really enjoy the trip to Mount batur half day tour 😀
name: Escape00556690296

title: Another nice experience in Malasya.
body: That was a beautiful and interesting tour. We know more about Malasya and its people now. The guide was very instructive and he gave us many recomendations about places to visit  along the country.
name: Yanella F

title: A great taste of KL
body: The whole tour was very interesting and the tour guide Raj was very informative and full of knowledge about KL which made it so much more interesting as a visitor to KL. His English was very fluent and interacted with the people in the tour
name: James L

title: Beautiful and informative guide.
body: Our guide Avalee was very knowledgeable of history and informative of interesting facts of Malaysia.   The caves and temples were beautiful!  We really enjoyed this tour.
name: Estanley

title: perfect trip
body:
Our tour guide Mcpall was very kind and introduced each attraction to us carefully. He is very familiar with Malaysia's history, geography and culture.
The natural landscape and architecture of Batu Caves impressed me deeply.
name: Discover56067940287

title: Wonderful and enjoyable trip to Bath Cave!
body: The tour guide Mcpall was very nice and helpful. His explanation was very clear and informative that made our journey wonderful and enjoyable. My family appreciated his service and effort. Thanks Mcpall!
name: Mobile41212602639

title: Excelente!
body:
excellent tour! The very friendly guide gave us a lot of information
First we went to the Batu cave, then to a place where women painted clothes and then to a metal factory. It is important to bring an umbrella to the cave.
name: Flor

title: Much better in person!
body: The place is astounding and the tour guide is very friendly and much informed about the batu caves. Before going to the Batu caves, you will visit the tin factory and batik store if you booked at noon, and vice versa if you booked at the morning.
name: Dante C

title: Awesome experience
body: The tour guide Raj was very informative and also very co-operative. The trip was very enjoyable and wonderful
name: Dreamer41878072062

title: Nice half day tour experience
body: Nice guide Siva, very informative, nicely scheduled tour spots. Batu Caves are magnificent. The Batik factory and the Tin factory can let you know the history and traditional techniques of Malaysia
name: Guide36327590213

title: Great tour to Batu caves
body: Sasi was a perfect guide and host,giving lots of useful information in an open an fun way to listen to. Also our daughters 12 and 15 enjoyed his presentation and could follow very well although nor native english speaker.
name: NorthStar24943086919

title: Best experience
body: So good, learned a lot! Best way to explore KL no doubt. Information and quick deep dive into each location, great experience
name: Veridiana G

title: Take this Batu Cave Tour
body: I really enjoyed the tour. The tour guid Mr Chandran was so approachable and patient. He assisted us well and he really explained everything, really worth it. hassle free tour.
name: Curiosity18778934237

title: Half day Batu cave & half day City tour
body: Highly recommended if you want to see all the highlights of Kuala Lumpur. I wanted to go to the most popular places in Kuala Lumpur which is Batu Caves and Twin Towers. Thanks to our driver and guide Amar Singh, a lot of knowledge Share it with us and fun to be had. I made a reservation that lunch was not included, Recommended for a quick lunch between the Batu Caves tour and the city tour. please note that there is a bottle of water to each person Additionally, we do not recommend locations place where Malaysian traditional clothes making and selling I think you can just skip it. Other than that everything was smooth.
name: Mobile59762759640

title: Great experience! Highly recommended!
body: My guide was Amar Singh and he did a fantastic job taking us to the different locations - Batu Caves, Batik and Royal Selangor Pewter. His deep knowledge of the locations, his eloquent sharing of Malaysia as a country and its practices and cultures, made it special and memorable! His service was impeccable and took care of the entire group, getting to know us and helping us with our questions and phototaking requests. Thank you Amar for making my solo experience wonderful!
name: Sam

title: Nice tour with friendly guide
body: Amar Singh is a very friendly guide and gave interesting information on the country and visiting sites.
name: Nathalie E

title: Malaysia - Batu Cave, batic & pewter tour
body:
The tour was so nice & beautiful.

Mcpall & Ravi are excellent tour guide & driver, they accomodate us to our destinations.
name: Jet23062855117

title: Must-go tour! Amazing tour guide!
body:
Batu cave was an amazing sight to behold! First time seeing such a huge cave!

Amar Singh, our tour guide, was equally superb! Very funny guy and multi-lingual! Heard him speak English, Chinese, Guangdong dialect, and I’m sure he can speak many more languages! Accommodated and took care of my mother who only spoke mandarin! Very entertaining and knowledgeable of our tour spots, learnt a lot about locations and culture thanks to him.

Hope the company gives a raise to this man! 🤩
name: Companion60457407442

title: batu caves
body: Great tour and wd enjoying the moment, our tour guide is Raj and he was so nice and helpful, recommended 👍🏻
name: Angeline Luwis

title: Worth to participate
body: Easy way to get basic experience and knowledge about KL popular sites. The price is reasonable and the guide is good.
name: Tour34922157594

title: Fantastic Tour
body: The trip was amazing our Tour Guide Macpall and Misul driveralso fantastic.Macpal is entertaining and feed us all good information. Thank you.
name: lilibeth a

title: Good tour in Malaysia.
body: Tour leader Mr. Mcpall and bus driver Mr.  Mirul was very professional and nice.  We were happy to join this tour.
name: Sherpa56071880736

title: Very Enjoyable!!
body:
This was a fantastic tour, would recommend. Sasi was a great tour guide with lots of knowledge about Malaysia. We saw the Batu Caves, Silk Factory and Pewter Factory which were all very interesting.
Also thanks to our driver Ben!
name: Jessica H

title: Highly recommended tour guide Raj!
body: Very informative and lively tour guide Raj! Highly recommended sir. Tour us into different part of Kuala lumpur with trivia
name: 2EZ4MYKEL

title: my very first getaway...
body: i love how Mr. Coomerlan guided us on this tour.  He made sure we're enjoying every destination we're in. such a wonderful experience. thank you Ivy Holidays.
name: Happiness02765601524

title: The tour is very good and its on time.
body:
The tour is on time. The tour guide guided us very good and shared some background history of the palaces we go to.

The tour guide is very friendly.
name: Relax51047170054

title: Awesome Tour
body: Amazing ! The tour is interesting and educational. :) Love how Mr.Coomerlan leads the tour and make it fun!
name: Explorer26322547622

title: Great guide and pilot
body: Kamal and Ben Teng were great. Kamal was interesting and knew a lot about the places we visited. He was helpful as well
name: Tendai M

title: Half day in Kuala Lumpur
body: It was nice trip. The Guide names Pall arranged everything perfect. It was interesting and he was very kind
name: Ira L

title: Good tour and friendly guide!
body: Your was very good and same as advertised. Tour guide mcpall was very friendly and gave some useful information about each stop on the trip. They rearranged the agenda to make sure we saw batu caves in the sunshine so that was a nice bonus too. No complaints about the trip, saw the caves and learned about some local crafts, would recommend!
name: ElMaestro91

title: Great tour
body: Amar Singh was the best tour guide and entertainer ever! Loved his insider informations. Would really recommend.
name: Joerg B

title: Best tour guide
body: Great tour, Raj was the best tour guide, he gave us a lecture about culture and history from Malaysia, much more than just Batu Cave. It was amazing.
name: Natalia Z

title: Ivy tour!
body: It was a very good tour! It was also a great experience with our tour guide Amar… I would mind booking again!
name: Gilian R

title: KL Experience
body: Amar of Ivy Holidays is very accomodating!😍 He shared a lot of wonderful things and does his job with heart 🎉
name: Companion07646060584

title: The tour is highly recommended
body: It is a tour with a very good experience, the entire way the guide Mcpall was explaining interesting facts about the tour, he was specific with the times and very efficient. The bus is well equipped with air conditioning and the driver Ravi was very friendly… The tour is highly recommended….
name: Berenice

title: Our couple tour.
body: The view is awesome. We took a lot of photos. Its good to be back again. We will surely back. We enjoyed!
name: kim b

title: Great adventure and informative guide.
body: We had a great holiday and we were very happy with everything! Thanks Sasi our guide  for your professionalism and good conversationalists and the very good driver, Saiful, who drove us safely. Everything was well organised, me and my wife Elvie really enjoyed our trip to Batu Caves, Batik factory and Selangor where pewter is being made.
name: BISAYANG Lolo

title: Bait Cavehalf day tour
body: Mcpall And Ravi  are Helpful, friendly and funny tour guide. Share us some history n background of Malaysia during trip.
name: Venture65045974320

title: Batu Caves experience
body: We were greeted by Mcpall & Ravi at our hotel on time and very friendly. Mcpall explained our itinerary and advised of our stops. He worked with Ravi to change the plan due to bad weather and it worked perfectly to avoid the rain. Lovely guide, great driver. Would highly recommend for your half day tour.
name: Safari50875424143

title: Flexible and well timed
body:
Our tour guide was McPall and he had a very pleasant personality and was clear in his instructions and stories which me and my husband enjoyed.

Our driver was Ravi and he made the trip very smooth and comfortable. Felt very safe throughout all the stops.

The 3 stops we went to were great, we especially loved the Royal Selangor Pewter stop which was much more enjoyable and interactive than we thought. The infrastructure was also good.

Batik stop was alright. Nothing out of the ordinary. I wish we could spend more time at Pewter than going to Batik.

Batu Caves was also nice. McPall gave us sufficient time to explore without feeling rush.
name: Michah_V

title: nice trip
body: such a nice trip, recommended to go with family since we only have 1 day for tour. mr mcpall is a nice and friendly guide too, thanks for the help
name: Roam15946780873

title: Amazing!
body:
Great views, really fun!! Very knowledgeable and engaging tour guide, and the ride was smooth and safe!!
Guide: Mcpall
Driver: Ravi
name: Navigator44372769132

title: great tour!
body: the tour was amazing! tour stops are beautiful & rich with culture & history. our tour guide was Raj - really friendly & knowledgable! he knows how to engage with the tourists well :) thank you!
name: Connector62105086937

title: Fantastic!
body: A great tour, would highly recommend. Raj was a fantastic, interactive highly knowledgeable tour guide!
name: Guide01468141693

title: Wonderful
body: Our guide Sasi was amazing and the trip very nice. The Batu cave very beatuful and the 2 more stops really interesting.
name: Sarai G

title: Perfect
body: Thanks Sasi, very kind and preparate guide! He explained us lot of things during the travel by bus.
name: giuly461

title: It was very nice
body: The views were amazing..take so many photos..bus driver was so nice..the tour guide was good.but the cab driver who picked up us from hotel he was very rude.
name: Voyager09882827908

title: Awesome experience
body: It was a amazing tour. Raj our Tour guide really taught us things we needed to know about the places we went to.
name: Sightsee23335174881

title: Very good tour
body:
Little travel, lot of sights, nice buildings, useful information about Kuala Lumpur and Malaysia.
Recommended
name: Petra K

title: great tour!
body: Your was very good pick up and travel was on time and efficient and the tour guide cooker pan was very informative and friendly. The pilot Hussain was very good too. We enjoyed the tour very much
name: Salma G

title: Very good trip :)
body:
Was a very Good Trip :)
Tour guide- Coomerlan and Pilot- Hussein were very good :)
We can recommend the tour, they also explained something about Kuala lumpur
name: Discover06836375324

title: Awesome your
body: My first tour and a fantastic tour. Raj is an awesome tour guide! Fun, friendly and extremely knowledgeable! Well beyond my expectations!
name: Steve T

title: Cultural batu and batik
body:
Fascinating trip especially the batu caves. Going early was sensible.our guide was excellent giving lots of cultural information. Safe driving, cool coach. Good idea to be dropped at the towers too. The batik workshop was interesting and showed how complex the trade.
Guide Coomerlan
Driver Darma
name: lesleyfoz

title: Life changing experience
body: What an amazing trip. Our guide was super accommodating and polite. He is highly recommended. High praise!!
name: Jabes S

title: Beautiful tour
body:
Really beautiful tour to Batu Caves.
Our Guide Coomerlan explain all about Kuala Lumpur. Amazing tour and guide !!! Thanks to the driver Hussein for taking us around Kuala Lumpur.
I absolutely recommend thi company. Thank you very much!
name: Leonardo P

title: Very nice tour
body: We really enjoyed the trip guided by Coomerlan + Hussein as driver. They were really nice and Coomerlan gave us many interesting facts about KL and the places we have  Been to. We can recommend it.
name: Turyn

title: Great experience!
body: Coomerlan was the guide and he was great! He was very informative and funny. The trip went very smoothly and I enjoyed all three stops. Hussein was our pilot and he was great as well! I’d recommend this tour.
name: Emily R

title: Great experience
body: The Batu Caves are a must see, very breathtaking. The whole day was really nice, our Tour guide - Coomerlan and Pilot- Darma very knowledgeable and helpful. I recommend booking this.
name: Ramona D

title: Amazing malaysia
body: The name of the tour guide is Mcpall he was very helpful and very informative we really enjoyed our tour the best!
name: laurensam l

title: Very good info
body:
Me and my wife really enjoyed this tour....!!!
All thanks to our guide Mr.Amar singh
Very smilling person and good information was provided
name: Global04054887741

title: Very good
body:
Our guide Amar Singh was very good with his information
Very friendly
Overall the tour was fun and knowledgable
Amar Singh was very nice and really a BOOM..!!!
name: Mobile18907203258

title: Highly recommended tour!
body: Our guide Coomerlan and Pilot- Saiful were great! Very knowledgeable, friendly and we'd love to go on another tour with them! An amazing tour!!
name: Luma B

title: Great tour, highly recommend
body: I had Amar as my tour guide, had a lovely trip was very insightful into the hindu culture and learnt alot! Quite a quick tour if you are looking to get to places with not alot of time.
name: Robyn21

title: Good Guide
body: The tour guide(Raj) was enthusiastic and funny enough to let us know more about the sights. Great places to visit
name: Reia Y

title: The Guide Mr.Raj was extremely skillful and made our visit very comfortable. He is an Asset for tourism promotion
body: The Baku Caves, City Tour, Museum, War Memorial, Supreme Court, Sultan Palace, Mask, Tin Factory and Textile Shop are amazing. We took lot of photos.
name: Dr Trinadh

title: Didn’t know what to expect
body: Booked last minute because I wanted to see the Batu caves. The caves themselves was a bit underwhelming but the tour guide Sasi made the bus ride interesting by telling us facts about the history of Malaysia. The bus was big nice and clean. We stopped at batik shop and Tin making shop but not for too long. Total time was about 4-4.5 hrs . Awesome can’t beat the price
name: Venture818100

title: Must visit Batu Caves
body: Batu Caves is a must visit place when you’re in KL. Make sure you bring water, hat and portable fan when climbing the 270 stairs. The cave is phenomenal. Our guide Sasi is a very experienced tour guide and he’s very entertaining. He loves his cultures and heritage. We learned a lot from him during our half day tour. The pilot - Mustafa is an experienced driver, good with navigating.
name: Me246

title: Good!!
body: very nice, our tour guide Coomerlan is nice too. He provided specific instructions. The driver Saiful drives smoothly. Both staff are friendly
name: AC S

title: Interesting Batu Cave, Batik Factory, and Royal Selangor Pewter Factory Tour with Coomerlan
body:
Tour guide: Coomerlan
Bus Driver: Saiful

Coomerlan was very knowledgeable and passionate in explaining the history of Batu Caves, the Batik Factory and The Royal Selangor Pewter Factory.

He's also witty and animated in explaining things so he was able to capture the tour participants attention well.

Definitely enjoyed the tour today.
name: Grace M

title: Batu caves and suburbs tour
body: The tour guide (coomerlan) was informative and the bus driver (Saiful) was very friendly. Overall was a fun trip.
name: Berry L

title: good one. coming back to KL for more tours
body: very nice, knowledgeable and accomodating. he carefully took us around and back to hotel on time. he also gave some facts and ample time for us to go around the sites.
name: Mikito

title: Batu Caves tour
body: The tour guide Sasi was very informative and engaging. The bus ride was clean and cool, taking about 20 minutes to reach the Batu Caves. Only 50 minutes of the tour was at the caves, however it offers enough time to explore and visit the temple. The rest of the tour was dedicated to the Bakit and pewter factories which were very informative. Would highly recommend if in the area.
name: Coastal65738018284

title: BATU CAVES
body: Sasi our tour guide is very informative. He made our tour very fun. Good experience. Good with family and friends
name: Flyer12827403141

title: Great trip with great tour guide
body:
This is my second time for Batu cave but first time with tour guide. Mr. Sasi, he really well-prepare, informative , be punctual and have good sense of humor

He told us about his country and religion which he really fond of it, he also share his life experience
name: Odyssey17524281232

title: Totally raccomanded
body: Me and my boyfriend joined the tour this morning... We had the pleasure to have Sasi as our tour guide who is a very nice guy who explained a lot to us about the Malaysian culture and made us appreciate more the Malaysian people and also he was very patient in answering all our questions and doubts. Also the driver was very nice. Thank you so much and hope to see you soon.
name: Valeria C

title: Lovely and kid-friendly tour
body:
The tour was very nice. Mcpall and the driver were very sweet and gave us interesting information about the caves as well as the factory. Highly recommended.

We initially got lost when we walked to the pick-up point and the driver was super nice and patient that he came to our location to pick us up.
name: Journey63294713566

title: Great experience! Thanks to Mcpall and Ben
body: The tourist guide Mcpall and driver Ben are professional and nice! The Batu Caves is spectacular. You have to come!
name: Sean

title: Batu Caves half day tour
body: Mcpall & Ben have done amazing job during this tour. They are really helpful and informative. Recommended tour guides!
name: GoPlaces53277112218

title: Excellent all round!
body: Excellent, informative tour. Raj and the bus driver were on point. No complaints on anything, we really enjoyed the tour
name: Jamie

title: Batu Caves Trip
body: Great Batu Caves tour. Very  professional  chofer  Hussein. Our guide Coomerlan gave us interesting explanations about all visited places ( tin factory and Bakut shop included)
name: Carolina A

title: Batu caves are great
body: Great tour, good information and the caves were amazing. Our guide Balan was fantastic and funny. The bus was comfortable and water was supplied
name: HowellD

title: Great Tour with out Guide Balan!
body: Great Tour to Batu Caves and Royal Selangor! (The Batik Stop is not that interesting) Informative Guide. Thanks Balan.
name: Fabian W

title: Batu caves
body: We are with Balan a Tourist guy very nice and interesting guy . The visit to Batu cave was great . Thank you so much Balan
name: yanis b

title: 100% recommended!
body: We took join-in tour to Batu Caves and it was super good! The guide was very professional and also funny. We saw Batu caves, Royal Selangor and Batik factories, it was interesting and informative. The price was extremelly good so we recomment it 100%.
name: Amber

title: A must do experience
body: Raj was my tour guide for this experience. I found Raj engaging as a tour guide and very informative. This half day experience I highly recommend.
name: Martin K

title: A Glimpse of Malaysia
body: The guide and driver are very friendly. We were introduced to the diverse culture of Malaysia. Good tour.
name: Pool

title: The view was amazing and the tour guide was very enthusiastic.
body:
Even before we arrived in our destination, our guide, Mcpall Singh, has already entertained us with fun facts. He seems fond of what he does and that sets up a positive mood throughout the tour.
Our driver, Aizat, make sure we travel fast but safe.
name: Curiosity68285528281

title: Well organised half day trip
body: Wll organised and on time. The activities conducted was smooth in the trip and the tour guide was friendly and presentable. Thank You  Mcpall singh guide and Driver Aizat.
name: Howdy Tay

title: Perfect half day tour
body:
Enjoyed a lot the tour with my family. Special thanks to our professional and funny guide McPall. Keep doing the great job!
We were the Robert family from Hungary.
Thanks,
Barbara, Mira, Marcell, Andrew
name: Andras

title: Amazing
body: Really good trip, very interesting commentary about the history of Malaysia and Kuala Lumpur and the cave is breathtaking.
name: George

title: Very good service! Keep it up Mcpall!
body: Mcpall Singh is a very good tour guide. Knowledgable and speaks very well english. Keep it up and hooe to see you again.
name: Rosalie M

title: Batu caves
body: The tour guide coomerang gave lot of information and very friendly. Pickup was on time. Overall tour was good.
name: Shub

title: Batu Cave Tour - Interesting culture and heritage!
body: Coomerlan our tour guide was very friendly and provided great details prior to the arrival of the spots we were going to visit. He was also funny and patient with our questions.
name: Dennis T

title: Amazing Experience, Guide, and Value
body: Strongly recommend to everyone! My friend and I had such a great time on this tour. It was just the right length if you're only in KL for a short time and want to see the major attractions, and everything included in this tour is super interesting, educational, and great for photos. The tour guide McPall was definitely the highlight as well, as my friend and I both noted how friendly, engaging, and funny he was, providing a lot of background information about Malaysia and the sites we were going to, which was exactly what we signed up for. The price of this trip is definitely worth it, and I strongly recommend it to everyone visiting KL. Also shoutout to our bus driver, I think his name was Mr.Hussein? It's also really nice that they ask where you want to be dropped off after the tour ends as it allows for more time to see attractions if you're there for a short time! All around amazing tour!!
name: Leilani

title: Awesome Tour
body: McPall was an absolutely amazing guide for our tour of the Kuala Lumpur suburbs and Batu Caves. He was incredibly knowledgeable about the history and culture of the area and gave us insight that you wouldn't be able to find out elsewhere. The itinerary was well-planned and very organized, giving us plenty of time to enjoy the sights. He also went out of his way to ensure we had an enjoyable experience, including recommendations of what food to try and places to go. We definitely recommend McPall for anyone interested in learning more about the area or just enjoying a fun and interesting tour.
name: Adrian N

title: Great Guide and Value
body: Very good value for the price. Plenty of time at the caves, and good preparation by the guide.  He was very informative about himself, the country, and the amount of trash to expect at the site. The place is a little scuzzy, but that would be the case with any tour.  The site was very interesting with many smaller temple. And the monkeys were fun to watch and photo.  The batik store and pewter factory were also interesting with no pressure to buy.  We were given the opportunity to be dropped off at a location other than where we started, which we did.  My ONLY caution was that their offer to pick up at your hotel MAY be limited to central city. We were somewhat farther and had to get ourselves to pick up.  No problem, but be aware. Communication was VERY good from the moment we reserved. Strongly recommend.
name: bradwago

title: Batu Caves
body: The tour was a nice look into Malaysia’s deep rooted culture. Our tour guide, Mcpall, was very knowledgeable and I enjoyed learning. Great value.
name: Veronika S

title: Batu Caves and country tour
body: Great half day, fuss free tour. Mcpall Singh was our guide for the day and he was wonderful at his job; good sense of humour, great knowledge of the sites we were visiting and very friendly.
name: Wajeha R

title: 10/10 highly recommend while travelling Kuala Lumpur!
body: This half day tour consisted of Batu Caves, Royal Selangor pewter tour and a visit to a local Batik shop. We had a fantastic 10/10 experience and would highly recommend this to anyone visiting Kuala Lumpur. Our guide Mcpall Singh and driver Thinesh were fantastic. Mcpall was super friendly and helpful but also very knowledgeable about Kuala Lumpur's history. We enjoyed learning from him, it made the tour all that much better
name: jamespatterson5998

title: Good trip
body:
Picked up early in a minibus and took us to meet the big bus which was waiting for us. Very comfortable.
Good tour guide, no issues at all, was given clear instructions. Loved Batu caves but it was absolutely manic. Didn’t think I could do all the steps but if you take your time and stop when needed, it’s fine. Enjoyed the trip and the Pewter factory which was very interesting. Would recommend.
name: Jonesy1974

title: Bang for buck!
body: Our tour was excellent. We should have bought a full-day trip, in my opinion. McPall, the tour guide, was outstanding. knowledgeable, warm, and accommodating. They were also very prompt and professional. recommending this agency.
name: Migoy

title: Batu caves and more!
body:
Kuya Wai is the coolest guide ever. He definitely knows what he’s doing and it shows that he enjoy sharing his culture.

He was on the dot when he picked us up from our hotel and explained the history of each places we’ve visited: Batu caves, Batik factory, and Royal Selangor factory.

He was also kind to help us decide on what to order as we’re not that familiar with Indian cuisine. His recommendations were delicious!

He was very attentive and always offers to help take our family picture. While doing the guided tours, he volunteered to play with our daughter so we can join and listen to the in house guides.

Lastly, he’ll ask where you’d like to be dropped off after the tour which is very convenient for tourists like us who have other plans for the second half of the day.

This tour is very well thought of and is definitely a bang for the buck. We’ll surely recommend this to our friends who will be visiting KL soon.

Thank you again Kuya Wai!
name: Berlynne C

title: GREAT Tour and an excellent tour guide!
body: Mr Wai is a 5* guy, he went above and beyond for us. The tour was well organized & packed with information. He picked us up from our hotel and explained where we were going and the significance of Batu Caves and gave us good tips and kept us on track with timing. But after that he went futher by recommending an excellent  food joint in China town for amazing food and showed us the best place for our first taste of Durian! We are planning on going on another tour with the same company and hopefully we get Mr Wai again! He also takes amazing pictures,  so feel free to hand him your phone! He's got an eye for your flattering angles ;p
name: Dan K
